recently bought a pair of Y2K baggy sweatpants, and they’ve quickly become a staple in my wardrobe!  Pros:  Retro Style: The Y2K vibe is on point, giving a nostalgic yet trendy look that pairs well with crop tops and oversized tees.  Comfortable Fit: The baggy design is super comfortable, allowing for easy movement and breathability.  Soft Fabric: Made from soft, cozy material, they’re perfect for lounging at home or running errands.  Versatile: Great for casual outings or just chilling at home, making them a versatile addition to any outfit.  Cons:  Sizing: The fit can vary, so it’s essential to check the size guide to find the right fit.  Limited Color Options: The selection of colors could be more varied to suit different personal styles.  Overall, these Y2K baggy sweatpants are a fantastic choice for anyone looking to embrace a retro style while staying comfortable. They’re fun, stylish, and perfect for a laid-back look. Highly recommended!

I ordered this pair of baggy pants in size XL (but it is equivalent to a Medium so follow the size chart) in Grey color. 评论概述: They fit according to the fit chart, decent material, good construction.
评论详情: I have a 28 inch waist and I order medium, so I'm at the upward limit of that size and that's exactly how they fit; the waist is snug and I don't need to tie the drawstring at all. Know your waist size and order accordingly, it'll fit. The material is fine and the stitching/tailoring is all fine too, no surprises. I got these so that I can take them off and on at the tennis court without having to remove my shoes. They work great for the purpose, the legs are wide all the way to the end. The look is what it is, it perhaps looks a little more "sporty" in real life than the "funky" look you see in the photos.  (Because the material is more like a wind breaker than cloth, if that makes sense). Depends, I guess on why you're buying them. Anyway, they work for me and I'm using them so I do recommend.
Ordered an XL because I always like loose fits and it fit like a medium! So you have to go up 2 sized to make it work. Will be returning and buying from another company.
